Package com.kennyscott.commons.dbutils

Class Summary
AbstractMain  
Common  
PersonBean A simple JavaBean which is used to show the BeanListHandler functionality.
Simple Basic implementation showing how to use the DbUtils package from Apache Commons.
Update This class shows how to update data in the database, especially using variable number of parameters, which came in with Java 5.
WatchDbConnections This class shows when database connections are being made.
